channel.title: [Delta][PZ]How to make player do a certain action on a certain tile
channel.description: I am trying to make the player in my tutorial do an action (In this case it's dialogue) on a certain tile. How would I do so?

item.title: [Delta][PZ]How to make player do a certain action on a certain tile
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:4, topic:459817”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=562720.msg4102629#msg4102629 date=1347670927]

You want the player to do an action on the tile he’s at?

Basically.

Current X = 7212
Current Y = 1218

I want to do the action of a dialogue on

Target X = 7244
Target Y = 1250
[/quote]

teleport the player to those coordinates but disable dialogue resetting when that specific dialogue is running
that’d be the only way[/quote]

Sorry for this being off-topic, but I’ve been looking around trying to figure out where I would disable dialogue resetting for awhile for specific things. How would I do that?

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta][PZ]How to make player do a certain action on a certain tile

item.title: [Delta][PZ]How to make player do a certain action on a certain tile
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:3, topic:459817”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=562720.msg4102623#msg4102623 date=1347670751]
You want the player to do an action on the tile he’s at?
[/quote]
Basically.

Current X = 7212
Current Y = 1218

I want to do the action of a dialogue on

Target X = 7244
Target Y = 1250[/quote]

teleport the player to those coordinates but disable dialogue resetting when that specific dialogue is running
that’d be the only way

Read full topic
